faqs.a: As you can imagine, rates vary by season. Please visit https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book for your dates to see current rates. If you have questions, you can send an inquiry from the same page.

faqs.q: What taxes apply and at what percentage?
faqs.a: The total tax for Destin is 13% consisting of: Sales tax 7% (Florida 6% + Okaloosa County 1% discretionary surtax) and Tourist Development Tax 6%.

faqs.q: Is travel insurance available or recommended? Through whom?
faqs.a: Yes, travel insurance is offered during checkout from Play Travel Protection. We encourage all guests to consider travel insurance.

faqs.q: Do you require a damage deposit or hold? How much and when is it released?
faqs.a: Yes, there is a $300 damage hold, released 48 hours after checkout.

faqs.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a: All payments are via credit card, which we believe is secure for both parties.

faqs.q: Can I modify or extend a reservation after booking?
faqs.a: We are happy to help as long as the calendar shows availability for the new dates.
We offer weekly and monthly discounts depending on the season. Feel free to send an inquiry at https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.

faqs.q: Are there any blackout dates or minimum night requirements?
faqs.a: We have a 3-night minimum booking requirement. For any exceptions or questions, please send an inquiry at https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.
Our condos are right by the beach with no roads to cross. Direct access via the boardwalk.
Unrestricted beach and gulf views from our condos.
We provide 2 beach chairs and 1 umbrella as complimentary. Per HOA rules, they must be placed behind
